languages.text: {n}Слуги Лорд-капитана приложили все усилия, чтобы скрыть любые улики и погрузить отряд инквизиторов в информационный вакуум. Увы, вряд ли леди Сюэ, отбывшая с Януса, купилась на этот обман — стоит ожидать, что ее группа вновь проникнет на планету уже тайно, а агентура, завербованная за время ее пребывания на мире, добудет необходимую ей информацию.{/n}

{n}The Lord Captain's servants have taken great pains to conceal any and all evidence to create an information vacuum around the Inquisition squad. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who has since left Janus, was taken in by this deception — her group will most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents she recruited during her sojourn on the world will obtain the information she needs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слуги Лорд-капитана приложили все усилия, чтобы скрыть любые улики и погрузить отряд инквизиторов в информационный вакуум. Увы, вряд ли леди Сюэ, отбывшая с Януса, купилась на этот обман — стоит ожидать, что ее группа вновь проникнет на планету уже тайно, а агентура, завербованная за время ее пребывания на мире, добудет необходимую ей информацию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The servants of Lord Captain have taken pains to conceal any evidence and immerse the Inquisitor squad into an information vacuum. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who had left Janus,had fallen for this deception — her group would most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents, whom she had recruited during her stay in the world, would obtain the information she needs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}领主舰长的仆人们煞费苦心地隐瞒证据，试图让审判庭的成员无法获得任何信息。遗憾的是，薛女士不太可能会上当受骗，尽管她离开了加努斯，但她的队伍接下来很可能会再次秘密登陆这颗行星。在加努斯逗留期间，她招募了许多特工，这些特工必将协助她得到她想要的信息。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain's servants have taken great pains to conceal any and all evidence to create an information vacuum around the Inquisition squad. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who has since left Janus, was taken in by this deception — her group will most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents she recruited during her sojourn on the world will obtain the information she needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}领主舰长的仆人们煞费苦心地隐瞒证据，试图让审判庭的成员无法获得任何信息。遗憾的是，薛女士不太可能会上当受骗，尽管她离开了加努斯，但她的队伍接下来很可能会再次秘密登陆这颗行星。在加努斯逗留期间，她招募了许多特工，这些特工必将协助她得到她想要的信息。{/n}
{n}领主舰长的仆人们煞费苦心地隐瞒证据，试图让审判庭的成员无法获得任何信息。遗憾的是，薛女士不太可能会上当受骗，尽管她离开了加努斯，但她的队伍接下来很可能会再次秘密登陆这颗行星。在加努斯逗留期间，她招募了许多特工，这些特工一定会帮助她得到她想要的信息。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán hicieron todo lo posible por ocultar todas y cada una de las pruebas para crear un vacío de información en torno al escuadrón de Inquisidores. Por desgracia, es poco probable que lady Xue, que ya ha abandonado Janus, haya caído en este engaño: lo más probable es que su grupo aterrice de nuevo en el planeta en secreto y que los agentes a los que reclutó durante su estancia consigan la información que necesita.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain's servants have taken great pains to conceal any and all evidence to create an information vacuum around the Inquisition squad. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who has since left Janus, was taken in by this deception — her group will most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents she recruited during her sojourn on the world will obtain the information she needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán hicieron todo lo posible por ocultar todas y cada una de las pruebas para crear un vacío de información en torno al escuadrón de Inquisidores. Por desgracia, es poco probable que lady Xue, que ya ha abandonado Janus, haya caído en este engaño: lo más probable es que su grupo aterrice de nuevo en el planeta en secreto y que los agentes a los que reclutó durante su estancia consigan la información que necesita.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ロード・キャプテンの従者は、あらゆる証拠を隠し、異端審問官の分隊に関して空白の情報を生成するべく、苦労してきた。残念だが、ヤヌスを去ったレディ・シュエがこの欺きに引っかかるとは思えない...彼女の一味はおそらく、秘密裏に再度この惑星に上陸し、惑星滞在中に募った諜報員を使って、彼女の求める情報を入手するだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain's servants have taken great pains to conceal any and all evidence to create an information vacuum around the Inquisition squad. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who has since left Janus, was taken in by this deception — her group will most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents she recruited during her sojourn on the world will obtain the information she needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・キャプテンの従者は、あらゆる証拠を隠し、異端審問官の分隊に関して空白の情報を生成するべく、苦労してきた。残念だが、ヤヌスを去ったレディ・シュエがこの欺きに引っかかるとは思えない...彼女の一味はおそらく、秘密裏に再度この惑星に上陸し、惑星滞在中に募った諜報員を使って、彼女の求める情報を入手するだろう。{/n}
{n}ロード・キャプテンの従者は、あらゆる証拠を隠し、異端審問官の分隊に関して空白の情報を生成するべく、苦労してきた。残念だが、ヤヌスを去ったレディ・シュエがこの欺きに引っかかるとは思えない...彼女の一味はおそらく、秘密裏に再度この惑星に上陸し、惑星滞在中に募った諜報員を使って、彼女の求める情報を入手するだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} prennent grand soin de dissimuler toutes preuves et de créer une bulle de désinformation autour de l'escouade de l'Inquisition. Hélas, il est peu probable que dame Xue, qui a quitté Janus, se soit laissée duper si facilement. On peut gager que son groupe reviendra bientôt en secret, et que les agents recrutés pendant son séjour sur la planète lui livreront toutes les informations dont elle a besoin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain's servants have taken great pains to conceal any and all evidence to create an information vacuum around the Inquisition squad. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who has since left Janus, was taken in by this deception — her group will most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents she recruited during her sojourn on the world will obtain the information she needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} prennent grand soin de dissimuler toutes preuves et de créer une bulle de désinformation autour de l'escouade de l'Inquisition. Hélas, il est peu probable que dame Xue, qui a quitté Janus, se soit laissée duper si facilement. On peut gager que son groupe reviendra bientôt en secret, et que les agents recrutés pendant son séjour sur la planète lui livreront toutes les informations dont elle a besoin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Diener des Lord Captains haben alles getan, um sämtliche Beweise verschwinden zu lassen und ein Informationsvakuum um den Trupp der Inquisition zu schaffen. Vermutlich hat sich Lady Xue, die Janus mittlerweile verlassen hat, aber nicht täuschen lassen. Ihre Gruppe wird wohl in aller Heimlichkeit erneut auf dem Planeten landen, und sie wird von ihren dortigen Agenten alle Informationen erhalten, die sie braucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain's servants have taken great pains to conceal any and all evidence to create an information vacuum around the Inquisition squad. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who has since left Janus, was taken in by this deception — her group will most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents she recruited during her sojourn on the world will obtain the information she needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Diener des Lord Captains haben alles getan, um sämtliche Beweise verschwinden zu lassen und ein Informationsvakuum um den Trupp der Inquisition zu schaffen. Vermutlich hat sich Lady Xue, die Janus mittlerweile verlassen hat, aber nicht täuschen lassen. Ihre Gruppe wird wohl in aller Heimlichkeit erneut auf dem Planeten landen, und sie wird von ihren dortigen Agenten alle Informationen erhalten, die sie braucht.{/n}

{n}Die Diener des Lord Captains haben alles getan, um sämtliche Beweise zu vertuschen, und ein Informationsvakuum um die Inquisitoren herum zu erschaffen. Lady Xue, die Janus verlassen hat, ist auf diese Täuschung aber vermutlich nicht hereingefallen. Ihre Gruppe wird gewiss erneut auf dem Planeten landen, heimlich, und die Agenten, die sie während ihres Aufenthalts rekrutiert hat, werden sie mit Informationen versorgen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetkârları, Engizisyon mangasının etrafını saracak bir bilgi vakumu oluşturarak tüm delilleri saklamak için büyük zahmetlere katlandı. Ne yazık ki çoktan Janus'tan ayrılan Leydi Xue'nun bu hilekârlığa kanmış olması pek olası görünmüyor. Grubu, büyük ihtimalle gezegene bir kez daha gizlice iniş yapacak. Leydi Xue'nun dünyada geçirdiği sürede işe aldığı ajanlar ise ihtiyacı olan bilgileri elde edecektir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain's servants have taken great pains to conceal any and all evidence to create an information vacuum around the Inquisition squad. Alas, it is unlikely that Lady Xue, who has since left Janus, was taken in by this deception — her group will most likely land on the planet once again in secrecy, and the agents she recruited during her sojourn on the world will obtain the information she needs.{/n}
